Class Words

java.lang.Object
Words
public class Words
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles everything with word generation for the Wordle.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int count
    Number of words in the list (subtracted when a word is pulled from the list)
    private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> fullWordList
    ArrayList containing all the words from the file (does not get edited)
    private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> word
    ArrayList containing the words from the file (gets edited upon pulling words)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Words()
    Words class constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkValidWord​(java.lang.String wordToCheck)
    Check if the user enters a valid word that is in the word list
    java.lang.String getRandomWord()
    Get a random word from list, and remove it from the list
    void readFile()
    Reads the input file using method "readIOFileToList".
    void readIOFileToList()
    Take the input filename and read all the words store them into arraylist word.

    • word

      Number of words in the list (subtracted when a word is pulled from the list)

  • Constructor Details

    • Words

      public Words()
      Words class constructor. Reads in the file with all the potential words of the day.

  • Method Details

    • readFile

      public void readFile()
      Reads the input file using method "readIOFileToList".

    • readIOFileToList

      public void readIOFileToList() throws java.io.IOException
      Take the input filename and read all the words store them into arraylist word.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - cannot read file

    • getRandomWord

      public java.lang.String getRandomWord()
      Get a random word from list, and remove it from the list
      Returns:
      a word

    • checkValidWord

      public boolean checkValidWord​(java.lang.String wordToCheck)
      Check if the user enters a valid word that is in the word list
      Parameters:
      wordToCheck - the word being checked
      Returns:
      whether the word is in the word list or not
